page.title: 04 BUILDINGS
page.content: On the way to the eastern approach to the Crags up Bracklinn Road is the{Red {well}which has mineral water.Also in Bracklinn Road is{Arden House}famous for its use in the T.V.series "Dr.Findlay's Casebook"Towards the west end of the town are old{Victorian {Villas.}One of these Brooklinn ,was used to film"The Country Diary of an Edwardian Lady". St.Kessog's Church was recently closed due to the union of the two churches of Scotland.There is much concern that this old and beautiful building,a focal point of the main square should not fall into disrepair.
